page.title: 03Education
page.content: The school is at the east end of Forteviot village and lies to the north of the B935. The building is made of white harling and red brick. The play ground lies in front of the school and is laid out in a netball court and various games. There is also a climbing frame, recently put out of bounds due to the poor surface under it.Grass lies to the north of the building. There are 20 pupils ; 11,P1-P4 and 9,P5-P7. And there are 2 teachers. We have cook and a cleaner, too, who used to be a temporay cook. Most children are brought to school on the transit van. They come from the Dupplin Estate,other children come in taxi from the Invermay area.One child cycles and six children walk. The school starts at 9.10a.m. The morning break is 10.30a.m.-10.45.a.m.
